Reviews.Content: Bit of Britain in WA Stayed for 3 nights, and had a great breakfast everyday. David is a pleasant host, and had decent tea which (for this Englishman) was what I needed to pep me up! Despite being close to the student area, especially fraternity/soriety houses, there was no noise and I slept well. With internet access and close to public transport, I would stay again. (I came for business at the university, and its a nice walk there from the guesthouse.)
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: Great Breakfast Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Quiet, near the university, friendly owners, enormous and delicious breakfast. David is happy to chat and has some interesting stories. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Recommended!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
